inclusion.criterion: Patient presenting to the emergency department
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pneumonia, pneumothorax, pulmonary embolism and esophageal rupture
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Patients who do not want to be included in the study
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: 34 year old man with dizziness, severe diarrhea and V. cholerae seen in stool specimen.
